executable.title: SUVComputationRSNA2011
executable.description: Computes the standardized uptake value based on body weight. Takes an input PET image in either DICOM or NRRD format (NRRD header must contain Radiopharmaceutical parameters).Produces a vector that contains SUVmin, SUVmean, SUVmax. This vector can be written to or appended to a cvs file.
